questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
This arc takes place on a floating island and involves the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a despotic ruler with the power of light. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate darkness. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This technique, used by Zoro, involves the use of three swords at once, including one in the mouth. What is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
This character is a former fleet admiral of the Marines, known for his ice powers and strict sense of justice. Who is...?
